directions: Mix cream cheese and peanut butter together thoroughly in a bowl. Stir confectioners' sugar into cream cheese mixture. Fold whipped topping into mixture with a spoon; mix thoroughly, scraping bottom and sides of bowl to incorporate completely. Add chocolate chips, gently stir into the mixture.
Spoon the filling into the pie crust, heaping more in the center of the pie.
ingredients: 1 cup creamy peanut butter (such as Reese's®)
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (Cool Whip®), thawed
¾ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips
title: Creamy Peanut Butter Refrigerator Pie
